Name: MPI_ADDRESS_KIND
Description: MPI_ADDRESS_KIND is the constant standing for the kind of integer in FORTRAN that represents a type able to contain a memory address. It is used in heterogeneous datatype creation routines for instance, such as MPI_Type_create_hindexed, MPI_Type_create_hindexed_block, MPI_Type_create_hvector and MPI_Type_create_struct. To see the C counterpart, please see MPI_Aint.
